content.html: this is great, this new policy of not allowing promoting other social networks is good I am part of the problem please ban me @elonmusk for co-authoring activitypub, the protocol used by, as you say, "masturbateodon" nothing could make me happier ban me birdsite daddy

this is great, this new policy of not allowing promoting other social networks is good

I am part of the problem

please ban me @elonmusk for co-authoring activitypub, the protocol used by, as you say, "masturbateodon"

nothing could make me happier
ban me birdsite daddy
